alert.note: Alert for Baxter; Marion; Searcy; Stone (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 13 at 11:24AM CDT until April 13 at 12:00PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Stone County in north central Arkansas... Eastern Searcy County in north central Arkansas... Southeastern Marion County in north central Arkansas... Southeastern Baxter County in north central Arkansas... * Until noon CDT. * At 1123 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Marshall, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Marshall... Norfork... Thola... Advance... Culp... Elberta... Herron... Leslie... Big Flat... Zach... Morning Star... Optimus... Cozahome... Lone Rock... Landis... Onia... Lone Pine... Gunner Pool Campground... Barkshed Campground... Harriet... TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 500 PM CDT for north central Arkansas. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 500 PM CDT for north central Arkansas.
